website_summaries.verdict: The Bowers & Wilkins P3 headphones' impressive combination of design, sound quality, and features put it near the top of the class for portable  headphones in its price range.
pros: The Bowers & Wilkins P3 headphones have an impressive design, strong performance, and an iPhone-friendly integrated microphone/remote
They also come with a hard-shell carrying case and an extra "straight-wire" cable that can be easily swapped in
cons: They're fairly pricey and the integrated, remote isn't compatible with all smartphones, and you'll get some sound leakage from open-back earcup design

customer_reviews.title: Remove the ear pads for best sound
customer_reviews.text: I found the sound on these headphones muffled and fuzzy and the headband too tight and unadjustable for tension. However, when I removed the ear pads (they're held on by magnets) - the sound improved dramatically - I mean like they sound completely different. Otherwise, these look great, are well made of high quality materials - nothing about it feels cheap. They even fold up nicely and comes with a color-matching hard case. If only someone at B&W paid attention to how much the ear pads affect the sound. I don't know if this was an oversight or a quality control problem - did the factory change the materials to something that wasn't acoustically neutral?
customer_reviews.author: J. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Small, simple and well built
customer_reviews.text: Fairly comfortable, though these are not long listening session headphones. I'm a bit sensitive about things on my head and I do notice them irritating me after about an hour or two. VERY portable, smaller than I would have expected and still provide great sound. I personally would not pay full price for these (which I didn't) but if you're looking for a travel friendly pair of quality headphones these could work.
customer_reviews.author: Just another sheep

customer_reviews.title: Not super sound
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t looking for super high fidelity headphones, so when I found that these B&W P3 headphones didn’t deliver awesome sound, I wasn’t too disappointed. Lacking in bass response and clarity is what I would say about sound quality. They are quite heavy for their size and have a fair bit of clamping pressure so after an hour plusof use you will feel them on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: It came in the original box and it looks great. The sound is a very nice sound
customer_reviews.text: It came in the original box and it looks great. The sound is a very nice sound, clear, natural and you can hear the details of the music. If you're looking for a quality sound and light headphones, this is a great option. It came with a hard case that helps to take care of your headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Obando

customer_reviews.title: great sound, not so great comfort...
customer_reviews.text: It would hv gotten 5stars for the excellent rendering and sound if not for the comfort of the ear piece,in this instance my left ear. After less than an hour of use, u can actually feel discomfort made by the pads,more so on my left. Otherwise, absolutely brilliant sound, clear definition of low,mid and ranges... I Love my cello music, and hv been struggling to find a decently price head phones that will make me fall in Love with my cello music all over again.. and I think I found it..in these P3..
customer_reviews.author: AuQ3 black bolt

customer_reviews.title: though if you stay too long your head might feel a bit like squeezed in vice
customer_reviews.text: B & W, befitting its illustrious history, offers ups rock-solid build in P3 Headphones with added convenience of stowaway case for travel. You'll be pleasantly transported to the aural world, though if you stay too long your head might feel a bit like squeezed in vice, on ever-so-gentle twist. In other words, not made for supremely comfortable listening to Wagner's operatic works. Well put together and of a style that will certainly turn a head or two on urban walks going up against nasty Beats. Quality of sound: quite good though I'm no expert.
customer_reviews.author: T. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Good stylish headphones at an intermediate price
customer_reviews.text: Good (maybe not great) sound, stylish and appear very well made. It's a matter of taste, and I prefer this on-ear design - I find earbuds uncomfortable and the enclosed type too hot. Could do with more padding in the headband. The case provides good protection. The wires are thin (good) but tangle too easily (bad!). The remote is too small for convenient use, but I don't use it anyway. Not sure what "recertified" means - the headphones and packaging all seem brand new to me!
customer_reviews.author: John in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Great Used In the Box -- Might as well be brand new
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly good! Expected a little wear and tear on this used in the box product, but it was brand new! The phones cancel a ton of noise even though they are not technically "noise cancelling" headphones. Sound quality is excellent and the design is very good. Fit is snug, but after a month of use is loosening up and fitting me well.
customer_reviews.author: David Stickney

customer_reviews.title: Not the best (but at this price point I suspected something was ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best (but at this price point I suspected something was up). If you want a decent pair of head phone for $70 these are not bad. However, if you are expecting the sound quality to go along with the fabled name... You will be disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Parsh

customer_reviews.title: really great sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great. I bought them for online meetings at work and unfortunately the mic doesn't work with the computer's 3.5mm plug, but I love them anyway. It's interesting the way they are conforming to my ears and getting more comfortable, the more I use them.
customer_reviews.author: S. PembleTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and sound of these headphones - they really are top quality. I have to say though that they really aren't that comfortable after about 30 minutes of use. They hurt the cartilage in my ears and start to give me a headache around the hour mark. I really wanted it to just be a bedding in issue but sadly it was still occurring three weeks late - I had to return them but maybe for other folks with smaller heads than me, they'll be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Colin McGloin

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Lightweight, balanced sound quality and they look premium. My only complaint - albeit a minor one - is the fabric on the ear cups tends to feel scratchy, especially after wearing them for a couple hours. I feel like these would be a 5 star if they had a softer material on the ear cups and if they offered a Bluetooth variant. Still one of the most compelling options on the market if you're looking for portability and style.
customer_reviews.author: Cale Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sounding and one of the most comfortable headphones I've ever used. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Espresso Boy

customer_reviews.title: This headphones are excellent, the sound quality is better and clearer than ...
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are excellent, the sound quality is better and clearer than others I have purchased in the past for the same price. The only problem I have with this headphones is that they seem to be made specifically for apple products. They do not work well with my Galaxy S4 even when I use the cord provided for computers and other devices but they work excellent with my ipod.
customer_reviews.author: victor figuereo

customer_reviews.title: great sound. too loud. too tight
customer_reviews.text: these sound great! I have a few issues: They are super tight. Definitely not for long time wear. And the sound bleeds so badly. I if i turn the volume up, everyone in the room can hear with I'm listening to.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: They are Nice and small but sadly they started to hurt her ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kid cause she keeps ripping cables out of kids headphones. With these you can replace. They are Nice and small but sadly they started to hurt her head. I have worn them for a bit. No bad but for the money I’d spend extra and go to P5s. I have a few pairs of Rhodes and they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Lipsitz

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing! The sound quality is really really nice. Also the case they come in is perfect for travel! They are light weight and don't hurt your ears if you are wearing them for long periods of time like some over ear headphones do. Also they look great on if that is something you are worried about!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They play clearly and work wonderfully. And, they don't hurt my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The unit wasn’t in the box. All I got was an empty box. Are you kidding me???
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rudominer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Highly impressed with these headphones! my only gripe is they can be a bit uncomfortable, but the memory foam seems to do its job and they begin to conform to your ears pretty well after a while. the sound is great, you can tell these are high quality and they have a very smart look to them.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Such a great headphone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Such a great headphone for the price! I paid under $60, but would consider it a good value for under $100 compared to the competition. Give it a bit of time to wear in and the sound warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: The design is gorgeous and the case is also awesome. Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant when I was looking for headphones. Since these weren't over the ear I thought the noise isolation would be minimal. I was highly wrong. The design is gorgeous and the case is also awesome. Sound is great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: im not an audiophile but it's better than most headphones to my ears
customer_reviews.text: im not an audiophile but it's better than most headphones to my ears. it doesnt get hot on your ears. had it from flight from SFO> HK. works great. only cleave is that when you wear it starts hurting your ears a bit.. switch it to the other way round.. they're meant to be fitted only one way
customer_reviews.author: ABoogiedown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product - noise reduction capabilities, better headphone grip and nice looking product.
customer_reviews.author: a NY-Staten Islander

customer_reviews.title: Really good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for about a year they are awesome headphones you're looking for iPhones these are really good the only complaint I have on them are there uncomfortable after like a half an hour of listening to him and I wish they blocked out a little bit more noise but they sound awesome
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound in a Stylish Package
customer_reviews.text: I got these Headphones for my wife and she loves them.. They are excellent; Sound Quality is superb, they are a stylish fashion statement, and the build, the foldability, the carrying case, etc. all worth the investment I made. Happy Wife = Happier me
customer_reviews.author: Rakan I. Alhendi

customer_reviews.title: Clear and precise
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound clarity. Used for studio use so precision was a must. Comfortable wear. Used in conjunction with JBL Monitors, Bose headphones, and Yamaha speakers for sound comparison.
customer_reviews.author: ale

customer_reviews.title: FAKE product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Product is a FAKE. The original woven fabric has been replaced with a printed fabric that mimics the woven pattern. Cans were stuck in position and no box was provided. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound from a compact and portable form factor
customer_reviews.text: These sounds amazing! Your mom thinks so too. Only complaint is the cord seems flimsy, but it includes a spare (w/o controls and mic). Also, the band is kind of tighy
customer_reviews.author: Dexlv6

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack metal part broke off after two and half years
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, not great but good. Fairly comfortable. Headphone jack / plug fell off after a few years.
customer_reviews.author: NotSoPicky

customer_reviews.title: B&W P3 headphones appeared to be a real discovery for me
customer_reviews.text: P3 has an impressive combination of sound quality, comfort and terrific look. B&W did a great job for all people on the move paying attention to every detail and making it to perfection. Steel rails, magnet earpads, soft plastic accompanied by good noise isolation and awesome sound put P3 to the top of class for portable headphones in this price range. These headphones will be truly appreciated by anyone, who values high quality and style.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I really, really enjoy these headphones. I've owned AKGs, Sony, Altec Lansing, Sennheiser, Bose and Audio-Technica headphones and I have to admit, these Bowers & Wilkins are my favorite. They have great range and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, comfortable fit, and cheap cord. Great news the cord is easily replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Save up and get the P5's instead
customer_reviews.text: I also own the P5 and P7, and I bought these cheaper P3's to use as computer headphones. While they look like a smaller/lighter version of the P5's, and they do scream "high quality craftsmanship" when you hold them, they don't feel great on the ear. The P3's wire headset shaping just isn't as good as the ultra-comfortable P5's, and the speakers don't sit flat on your ear the way the P5's do until you manhandle/bend the headphones to fit your head. Save up your money and go for the P5's instead - they're a world better in terms of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Ozar

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable. Pads misaligned
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable. Pads misaligned. Sound focus off, Fairly clear, lows acceptable, but can not wear for extended period of time. I’ll keep my etymotics.😐
customer_reviews.author: BG. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great sound pretty balanced
customer_reviews.text: Great sound pretty balanced, very comfortable, and added a whole new dimension to my music. the key for me was the ability to use my phone. The price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Lou T.

customer_reviews.title: These are great sounding cans
customer_reviews.text: These are great sounding cans.My only reservation is that they are ON ear cans and this may not be comfortable for some people like my wife, but that's okay as I get to listen to them more!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Picked them up for under $60. Wife loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Don Barda

customer_reviews.title: nothing significant about sound quality. nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Right ear muffins pulled out from slider, 6 months of use. I'm sure B&W won't warranty. Won't get another pair unless I get them directly from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Sometimes I do

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever heard...
customer_reviews.text: I'd never heard of Bowers & Wilkins until a friend bought a pair of their speakers. Decided to give their headphones a try and am delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Scheerhoorn

customer_reviews.title: amazing headphones, the only downside is that the headband ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing headphones, the only downside is that the headband is not soft enough and starts to hurt at the point of contact with the head
customer_reviews.author: Andrei S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect, the refurb looks exactly like a new one
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect, the refurb looks exactly like a new one. Only minus is the lack of cushion on top of my head, it feels hard compared to others in this category
customer_reviews.author: LOW

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship, compact and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Great craftsmanship, compact and comfortable to wear. Sound is ok, enough low end sound but lacks a little more detail on the high frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Radamez Velez

customer_reviews.title: Car run office
customer_reviews.text: Fit the head well enough to run in, amazing for car phone conversations and for the office love these. Compared to everything else I have ever tried these win!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea D. Thom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are simply fantastic. The sound is rich and detailed, and they are beautiful. The only con is: As any white product, it gets dirty reasonably easy. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gratarolli

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but not noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these are great but if you are looking for background noise cancelling, these are not for you. I was sitting on the plane with a young woman who had seriously annoying sound bleed from her iphone earbuds and was hoping these headphones would allow me to listen to an audiobook without hearing her music. Didn't happen. I had to switch to listening to music with the sound turned up. The sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Audio quality is great if you have something strong enough to drive it
customer_reviews.text: Audio quality is great if you have something strong enough to drive it. I use them exclusively for my Cowon Plenue D, which sounds amazing through these. On a Macbook Pro, though, they're a little weak, but that's the laptop's fault; my desktop PC drives them just fine. My only complaint is that they hurt like hell after two or so hours of listening. I stretched them frame a bit out to accommodate my head, which is dead in the "medium" size range, and it alleviates the pain a bit, but these are definitely for listening in bursts rather than long-term.
customer_reviews.author: ThunderPumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great sound. I use them on a plane quite a bit and thought I would not miss noise reduction, but I do. Case is nice but wish there was a better way to put up the cable as it often get pinched when I close the case.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the money - a huge upgrade to any budget headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I know there is already Series 2, and the world is going wireless, but for a $35 - the value is unbeatable. No such sound quality even for double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product. Also snaps too tight on the ear. Uncomfortable after a while. Stick to Bose.
customer_reviews.text: Hi. One side of this headphone does not work. How do I get it fixed?
customer_reviews.author: PRITI RAO

customer_reviews.title: It makes everything Sound like a concert!!
customer_reviews.text: The best Headphones I have ever listened to!! It makes everything sound like a full concert!!
customer_reviews.author: Armen essayan

customer_reviews.title: Another great B&W product
customer_reviews.text: I am a dedicated B&W person and like all my other speakers the P3 does not disappoint. I use these for my frequent travel , the sound and comfort are perfect for my use
customer_reviews.author: EMS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These light-weight, comfortable headphones manage to handle the highs with clarity, and still have a very pleasant low end without muddiness. I have owned quite a few headphones and the P3 is easily one of the best sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Vince70

customer_reviews.title: Cool Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These elegant looking phones fit well and provide a very good listening experience. Bass is tight, treble is smooth, mids are detailed. They are not the most dynamic sounding phones, but that's safer for your ears. Ear muffs are replaceable and easy to remove. Wires are also replaceable and easy to remove. The OEM wires were a little annoying, so I replaced them. Note: these headphones have been replaced by a newer model. Get them while you can.
customer_reviews.author: JWil

customer_reviews.title: I love the headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the headphones. Beautiful headphones; the sound is very clear. For the price, design and sound quality of the headphones makes B&W the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are well worth the money. The sound is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Drake

customer_reviews.title: Nice but no good
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful headsets are not as good headphones as they are pretty. Quality of materials is prime. Nevertheless the fabric on the earbuds is kind of rough. They don’t sound very good. Sound is very flat and I can never find a good volume in which they really give their best. I would definitely send them back and get my money back if I could.
customer_reviews.author: EDGAR ZURITA

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I paid roughly $50 for these headphones and at that price these are superb. They sound great and are np to power. They leak but not too much, these are perfect for a commute on the bus or on the ferry. They are comfortable and light. They have some clamp but just the right amount. They stay in your head but do not crush it.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I like the P3s over the P5s, but didn't find it to be significantly better than other headphones more affordable than these. Given the opportunity to do it over again, I would've gone with Harman Kardon's entry level offering. Still, it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Will.i.am

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, nice build quality
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound, comfortable, nice build quality, portable, and great all around
customer_reviews.author: Memo Cerda

customer_reviews.title: Bowers and Wilkins Headphones
customer_reviews.text: You will love these - if you've been living off the free I Phone headset like I have for years you will hear a range of sounds you have not heard for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sound on refurbished headphones
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the prior review from Linux-Works, these look great but sound horrible. I also got a refurbished set and that could be the issue. They looked brand new. They were very comfortable but my old Apple ear buds sounded better. Not loud enough, no high end. Sadly I had to return them even though I loved the design. The two stars are for the design.
customer_reviews.author: kimina2

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design and sound quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and sound quality is very good. I also own the P7 Headphones which are now my favorite over the Senheiser 595 which were my favorite. The don't have the bass or the sound quality of the P7 but still sounds good. I got the recertified for $100 so a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: mrajfura

customer_reviews.title: good sound, good for showing off
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the sound Pushes ears a little, can withstand 2 hours though Wires are replaceable
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I borrowed a black pair and ever sense wanted to get a pair of my own. These are really quite a pretty red. Not quite cherry red, but a bit more tomato colored. Still, the sound is what its all about and they do have them in spades. Price was also good when I purchased which make it easier to swallow. I don't like the base heavy beats headphones. which for my ear muddies the music too much.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Pot Pie

customer_reviews.title: Happy birthday to me and my new B&W crimson red ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Bowers & Wilkins, need I say more....always top quality and top performance. I keep this brand in my home entertainment system and my Jaguar XJ vehicle, I'll never ruin my ears to cheap sound quality. Happy birthday to me and my new B&W crimson red headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Can get tight on ears after prolonged use, especially if you have glasses. Great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Kaled Ali

customer_reviews.title: Love the audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the audio quality, a huge leap from Apple earbuds I'll tell ya, but I really want to cut the cord. Probably should have sprung for a pair of Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Kern

customer_reviews.title: They are way too tight on my head and hurt my ears.
customer_reviews.text: I had tried them at the store and they were great. But after a few weeks, they are not. The metal spring is actually very tight, and after less than an hour, my ears begin to hurt and I have to take them off for a while.
customer_reviews.author: NeverEatAlone

customer_reviews.title: so they fall off easily. In fact
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this Recertified Headphones! They don't come with a cable with volume control and a case as advertised. The ear pads are attached to the headphones with weak magnets, so they fall off easily. In fact, the ear pads I got could simply be the wrong kind. Or, the factory workers put the magnet the wrong way, so the ear pads and the headphones repel. This is the worst Amazon shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: TonTonTon

customer_reviews.title: This is what a headphone should be.
customer_reviews.text: A really good headphones. I have wore tens and tens of headphones. This is probably the best sounding headphone across. I really like the construction of the headphone. The magnetic cup can be replaced and even the connector can be swapped. It is every bit worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TGNJ

customer_reviews.title: she claims they are the most comfortable airplane headphones she's ever had
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife...she claims they are the most comfortable airplane headphones she's ever had.
customer_reviews.author: avdrav

customer_reviews.title: Used, broken, and smell used. NASTY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new Bowers and Wilkins headphones. I knew something was up when it looked as if the box had been retaped. The left line switch was broken with wires hanging out, but the the worst part was, that the ear pads were dirty and smell of someones hair tonic. NASTY! Theses were sold as new.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Maybe as a starter set these are fine. I'm just not sure how or when to use them.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 cents...

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel
customer_reviews.text: The prior reviews very accurate. Light, not too tight , and comfortable. Good sound quality. Would easily recommend. Especially as travel headphones chose these over similarly priced beats.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Parham

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and portable
customer_reviews.text: I listen mainly to jazz and blues. P3's very neutral but detailed and great bass for small phones. Looks good. Also won't embarrass you at work.
customer_reviews.author: TEF San Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Really comfortable and you hear the music. I would highly recommend them. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brown

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy: Fake, cheap, and not as promised
customer_reviews.text: I think these are FAKE. They are not constructed the same way as the ones that are not certified, using cheaper materials and they did not come with a microphone so you can use them on phone calls. I ordered them twice, first time they sent me the wrong color. I return both headsets since they both came without a microphone. I recommend you buy these directly from the Bowers & Wilkins website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Head band came broken and had to buy iPhone/iPod compatible ...
customer_reviews.text: Head band came broken and had to buy iPhone/iPod compatible wire. Advertised having both but only came with regular wire. Not the one with the mic. Also one magnetic ear piece was missing a second nub that keeps it in place. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: very confortable
customer_reviews.text: they are very comfortable.the sound is b plus with a regular computer. not tested with an amplifier .they would sound awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R

customer_reviews.title: These are the best headphones I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had several high-end headphones and these win hands down. Bowers and Wilkins are my new go-to choice of audio equipment.
customer_reviews.author: cyclephreak

customer_reviews.title: Sounds is great. BUT
customer_reviews.text: Sounds is great. BUT: I can't wear them for more than 30-45 minutes, the headband presses against the top of my head and really hurts. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: kkpc0869

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent and very comfortable over the ears. Very stylish and flexible. Item was shipped on time. I would definitely recommend to anyone shopping for a pair of head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Mullings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A couple hours into listening, my initial impression is that these are definitely worth the coin!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Morse

customer_reviews.title: The product my husband & I purchased is a great deal, the site we bought from (World Mercantile)
customer_reviews.text: The product my husband & I purchased is a great deal, the site we bought from (World Mercantile), we will be buying from them again. The product has good quality sound & it fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid recertified version
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the recertified version. Not as advertised. Did not include case or wires. Had to order replacement directly from b&w. Headphones did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Roldan

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them, and hey, they are different from Beats!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Adamo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound...BUT
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, however broken after just 16 months. Left earpiece has totally not audio at all.
customer_reviews.author: ahkong

customer_reviews.title: please ask before buying
customer_reviews.text: headphones came as advertised - the cable was not - no volume control
customer_reviews.author: feroz

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sound these headphones produced, but after 1 month of very, very light use, the jack that connects the headphones into my phone disconnected (meaning the metal piece detached from the rubber piece). These are great headphones, but I worry the craftsmanship may not match the price.There is also no way to reach out to the company to ask for a replacement pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you buy these, the bad guys win.
customer_reviews.text: My head hurts from wearing these 6 months after I stopped. Essentially zero padding and INSANELY tight springs make this feel like the two ear pads are trying to meet in the center of your skull. DONT DO IT.
customer_reviews.author: boscbiji

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected better from this brand. It fits weird on ears. There is no seal worse than cheap pair of ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality of these headphones is excellent - no doubt about that
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these headphones is excellent - no doubt about that. However, after 5 minutes of wearing them, I realized that they are not for me. They are so tight and hurt my years and head so much that it was simply impossible to enjoy them. I don't think I have a large head: an average for a 5.9" person. The problem is, you cannot regulate the pressure of the headphones by extending or contracting them: when extended, they slid off the ears and moved very easily with my head's movements; when contracted, they hurt my head even more with the band. I have returned them after 2 days of interrupted use (could not stand the pain).
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I like, I have a Jabra Revo
customer_reviews.text: I like, I have a Jabra Revo, Sennheiser momentum on ear, Soul by ludakris, and these it is my favorite. BUTTTTTT DONT SENDME THE CASE.
customer_reviews.author: mitchell hererra

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend this set of cans to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Junk! The cord won't stay connected to my headphone extension cord. When it does, the sound is very tinny. Cheap feel, too. Don't recommend this set of cans to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Also the Amazon working pretty bad as they send the packet in box from ...
customer_reviews.text: The product themselves seems ok but not that I expected to see. Also the Amazon working pretty bad as they send the packet in box from shaver that's what impossible recognize what is inside.
customer_reviews.author: Yevgen Blyznyuk

customer_reviews.title: Awful Cans
customer_reviews.text: Awful.....Dull, inaccurate, No musical involvement. Sent them back. These expensive headphones are not worth half the price. Don't let the fancy packaging throw you off.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie P

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These earphones do not fit comfortably on your head. Can't recommend them given the price. Earbuds produce better sound and greater comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set of headphones Good quality sound. Bought them for my husband for his birthday and he uses them every day since. He loves them! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Seatsuz

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins P3 Headphones - White/Grey
product_meta.description: Style:Headphones| Color:White| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingP3 combines pristine audio performance with maximum wearability. These slim line headphones fit lightly and snugly on your head, and fold up to stow away in your pocket or their own hard-shell carry case. And they produce a remarkably natural, detailed sound on the move, thanks to some major technological innovations that reduce distortion to a minimum.
feature_bullets: The stylish, light and foldable P3s deliver an exceptional sound experience and come with a specially designed hard-shell carry case.
Heat-sensitive memory foam pads mold to the shape of your ears, becoming more comfortable and enhancing sound quality over time.
Bespoke fabric provides acoustic transparency, while forming a perfect seal around the edge for better bass and noise isolation.
Made for iPhone remote/microphone cable, plus a generic cable that works with all smartphones, tablets and MP3 players.
Bowers & Wilkins' P3 Headphones come with a 2-year limited warranty only when purchased from an authorized dealer including Amazon.com (indicated by ships from and sold by Amazon.com).
